net.sf.JRecord.IO

Class BinTextWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.IO.AbstractLineWriter
      • net.sf.JRecord.IO.LineByteRecordWriterWrapper<AbstractByteWriter>
        • net.sf.JRecord.IO.LineWriterWrapper
          • net.sf.JRecord.IO.BinTextWriter

  • public class BinTextWriter
extends LineWriterWrapper
    This class will write a AbstractLine to a standard Windows/*nix Text file. It is similar in function to TextLineWriter, the difference being TextLineWriter uses Standard BufferedWriter (String based) Class for Writing and can not handle Hex (i.e. x'FF') values correctly, while this class uses streams and is able to handle Hex values. This class is based on ByteTextWriter.

    This class was written to support hex field (x'FF') separators in csv (delimited) files.

    Version:
    0.68
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
    See Also:
    TextLineWriter, ByteTextWriter
